#Text=It 's Bolin !

#Text= Shiro Shinobi says : " Folks , that cheer you 're hearing is for local favorite , Bolin , of the Fire Ferrets .

column1: #Text=Let 's see if we can get a quick interview .
#Text=Bolin !
#Text=Bolin , the Fire Ferrets are out for the season .
#Text=How have you been spending your time lately ?

#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , I took a trip South for the Glacier Spirits Festival , was briefly engaged to a princess , then went through kind of a tough breakup there , was accidentally involved in a civil war ... But there 's nowhere I 'd rather be than pro-bending night in Republic City !
#Text=Am I right , people ?
#Text=Republic City !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Do you miss being in the ring ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , I definitely do n't miss getting hit with things all the time , and the humiliating losing .
#Text=I mean , that gets pretty old .
#Text=You know , sometimes I actually cry myself to sleep ... I guess what I miss the most are these fans !
#Text=They 're the greatest fans in the world !
#Text=Give it up for the fans !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Look how these people love you , kid !
#Text=They 're eating that cornball spiel right out of your hand .
#Text=" Bolin says : " The trick is , whenever I get confused , I just say " Republic City " or " fans " , and then everyone cheers .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I think I just figured out your true calling .
#Text="
